content:
That's a great point about the potential risks of commercialization and oversimplification of complex mental health issues. It's important for influencers and celebrities to be mindful of their impact and ensure that they're promoting positive and accurate representations of mental health.

I've also noticed that social media can be a helpful tool for people to connect with others who share similar experiences and struggles. Do you think online support groups and communities can be an effective way to provide support and resources for people struggling with mental health issues?
